name: function 11
Define logTags and allHoldRegTags
Check Alarm Status
Get alarms
func:
// Define the alarm messages
const alarms = {
    "LT201_Timer.Done": "SEP200 low. System will shut down if level remains low.",
    "LT203_Timer.Done": "SEP200 over-filled. System will shut down if level remains high.",
    "LT301_Timer.Done": "SEP300 low. System will shut down if level remains low.",
    "LT303_Timer.Done": "SEP300 over-filled. System will shut down if level remains high.",
    "ResinChange_Alarm": "Change resin bottle after this run.",
    "Temp_Alarm": "Water temperature approaching shut down limit.",
    "CellTemp_Alarm": "Cell temperature approaching shut down limit.",
    "InPressure_Alarm": "Inlet pressure approaching limit.",
    "Pressure_Alarm": "Backpressure approaching shut down limit.",
    "PressureDrop_Alarm": "Backpressure approaching lower shut down limit.",
    "PressureDrop_SDAlarm": "Backpressure too low. System will shut down.",
    "Conductivity_Alarm": "Conductivity approaching maximum acceptable level.",
    "Flow_Alarm": "Flow control may be malfunctioning.",
    "Current_Alarm": "Cell current deviating. Power supply may be malfunctioning.",
    "UnderVoltage_Alarm": "Cell voltage is dropping below minimum desired voltage.",
    "OverVoltage_Alarm": "Cell voltage is rising above maximum desired voltage.",
    "LEL_Alarm": "Caution: Lower LEL limit reached.",
    "Leak Detected": "Water detected. Check for leaks.",
    "Leak Confirmed": "Leak confirmed. System will shut down.",
    "HCDVoltage_Alarm": "Voltage powering LEL sensor deviating from required voltage.",
    "Fume Hood OK": "Low flow detected in fume hood. System will shut down.",
    "EStop OK": "EStop activated. System will shut down.",
    "Air Monitor OK": "Room air monitor error. System will shut down.",
    "Temp_SDAlarm": "Water temperature reached maximum. System will shut down.",
    "TCError_Alarm": "Thermocouple error. System will shut down.",
    "InPressure_SDAlarm": "Inlet pressure reached limit. System will shut down.",
    "Pressure_SDAlarm": "Backpressure reached limit. System will shut down.",
    "Conductivity_SDAlarm": "Conductivity reached limit. System will shut down.",
    "Flow_SDTimer.Done": "Flow control malfunctioning. System will shut down.",
    "UnderVoltage_SDTimer.Done": "Cell voltage too low. System will shut down.",
    "OverVoltage_SDTimer.Done": "Cell voltage too high. System will shut down.",
    "Current_SDTimer.Done": "Cell current major deviation from SP. System will shut down.",
    "LT201_SDTimer.Done": "SEP200 low level uncorrected. System will shut down.",
    "LT203_SDTimer.Done": "SEP200 over-fill uncorrected. System will shut down.",
    "LT301_SDTimer.Done": "SEP300 low level uncorrected. System will shut down.",
    "LT303_SDTimer.Done": "SEP300 over-fill uncorrected. System will shut down.",
    "HTLC_HTR201": "HTR201 temperature limit reached. System will shut down.",
    "HTLC_HTRCell": "HTRCell temperature limit reached. System will shut down.",
    "HCDVoltage_SDTimer.Done": "Voltage powering LEL sensor uncorrected. System will shut down.",
    "PressureDrop_SDTimer.Done": "Backpressure dropped below minimum. System will shut down.",
    "CellTemp_SDAlarm": "Cell temperature reached limit. System will shut down.",
    "LEL_SDAlarm": "Higher LEL limit reached. System will shut down.",
    "Battery Low": "UPS battery low.",
    "Power Lost": "Power lost. UPS in battery mode.",
    "Battery Fault": "UPS battery fault.",
    "PS110": "Nitrogen purge pressure low.",
    "PS110_Bad": "PS110 Bad"
}

// Store the alarms object as a flow variable
flow.set("alarms", alarms);

node.status({ fill: "green", shape: "dot", text: "Alarms stored in flow" });

// Get the number of alarms dynamically
const numAlarms = Object.keys(alarms).length;

// Define the starting Modbus address for alarm coils
const startAddress = 100;  // Modbus address 00100

// Create the Modbus Flex Read payload
msg.payload = {
    'fc': 1,  // Function code 1 (Read Coils)
    'unitid': 1,  // Modbus device ID (change if necessary)
    'address': startAddress,  // Starting coil address
    'quantity': numAlarms  // Dynamically set quantity based on alarm count
};

return msg;

name: Update symbol color
Single coil write
HMI_Manual
SV120
func:
var msg = { payload: { "tag": "HMI_SV120_Open", "setpoint": msg.payload } };
return msg;

name: SV130
func:
var msg = { payload: { "tag": "HMI_SV130_Open", "setpoint": msg.payload } };
return msg;

name: SV210
SV310 (NO) off
func:
var msg = { payload: { "tag": "SV310.HMI_Close", "setpoint": msg.payload } };
return msg;

name: SV320
func:
var msg = { payload: { "tag": "SV320_HMI_Open", "setpoint": msg.payload } };
return msg;

name: Change switch font
format:
<style>
/* Apply font style to all switch labels */
.md-container label,
.nr-dashboard-switch p {
    font-family: "Arial", sans-serif !important;
    font-size: 10px !important;
    font-weight: normal !important;
    color: black !important;
}

/* Target a specific switch label by its text */
md-switch:has(span:contains("Your Switch Label")) {
    font-family: "Verdana", sans-serif !important;
    font-size: 20px !important;
    color: red !important;
}
